sentence: Then Ron DeSantis and the Florida Republicans brought the hammer down on Disneys special self-government status in central Florida.

title: Disney Just Fired Its Corporate-Affairs Chief

title: Disney silent on SCOTUS opinion leak, but weighed in on Florida parents bill

sentence: Communications misfires led to a rapid executive departure Disney has spent weeks in the headlines thanks to the Republican governor of Florida, Ron DeSantis, over the state's "Don't Say Gay" legislation, which bans elementary school classroom discussion of sexual orientation or gender identity.

title: Disney CEO Bob Chapek's missteps have entertainment insiders speculating about how he can keep his job and who might replace him if he doesn't
